Instruction: Cut the cabbage into wedges, keeping the core intact to hold the leaves together.'
'Place cabbage wedges on a baking sheet.'
In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.'
Brush the olive oil mixture over the cabbage wedges, ensuring they are well coated.'
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cabbage is tender and edges are browned and crispy.'
